da.dialog.dashboard.reset.title: Reset dashboard?
da.dialog.dashboard.reset.description: The dashboard is reset to its initial state. Your changes will be discarded.
da.welcome-widget.text1: Get to know ctrlX OS and find out how to take your first steps with it.
da.welcome-widget.title: Welcome
da.welcome-widget.steps-to-take: There are still some steps to make ctrlX OS ready for use:
da.welcome-widget.register.heading: Register your device
da.welcome-widget.licensing.heading: License your ctrlX OS installation
da.welcome-widget.trial-mode-hint: Until then ctrlX OS runs in trial mode. It shuts down after 4 hours and a restart is necessary.
da.welcome-widget.trial-hint-2: Your ctrlX OS installation is not licensed yet and runs in trial mode.
da.welcome-widget.trial-hint-3: You can try out everything, but the system shuts down automatically after 4 hours and a restart is necessary.
da.welcome-widget.get-license.link: Get your ctrlX OS license now
da.welcome-widget.register.hint: Register your device in the | ctrlX Device Portal | to gain access to our store and to obtain licenses.
da.welcome-widget.meantime-how-tos: In the meantime check out our | How-To video series|.
da.welcome-widget.also-how-tos: Check out our | How-To video series|.
da.shutdown-header-notification.unlicens: Your ctrlX OS installation is not licensed yet and runs in trial mode. It shuts down automatically after 4 hours.
da.shutdown-header-notification.virtual-: You are running a ctrlX CORE virtual, which is only intended for testing purposes. It shuts down automatically after 4 hours.
